title.rendered: MAI’s Ryan Catanese Featured in Crain’s Cleveland Business

content.rendered:
Sports and Entertainment Wealth Advisor, Director Ryan Catanese discussed the financial challenges that professional athletes in Cleveland face with Crain’s Cleveland Business. He shared, “There’s some sticker shock. [Taxes and fees] can add up quickly.” Read more here

By clicking on the above link, you will leave MAI’s site and will be directed to a third-party site which MAI does not endorse and is not affiliated. Some third-party sites require registration or subscription to view content. Please see MAI’s disclosure page for more information.
